txt.en:
'I do not know what you two spoke about, but my heart tells me that my people are right not to allow Asmund beyond the borders of Lórien.

'I beseech you, [placeholder] -- do not betray the trust of my people. Whatever Asmund asked of you, I say to you this: ignore it! Go instead to Glordirith, a friend of mine and protector of all things that move within the Golden Wood. He is entrusted to this duty by Celeborn himself, and if you tell him whatever it is Asmund asked you to do, I know you will be rewarded for it.

'Glordirith is in south-eastern Lothlórien, at Imlad Lalaith in Egladil, on the banks of Anduin.'

'I thank you for your news of Asmund, [placeholder]. You have done well to bring his doings to my attention.\n\n'We will keep a close watch on any who have dealings with Asmund the Poacher from this day forth. You are to be commended for your service in defence of the woods of Lórien.'
'Glordirith is in south-eastern Lothlórien, [placeholder], at Imlad Lalith in Egladil, on the banks of Anduin. Tell him of Asmund's activities and ignore whatever request that dwarf made of you!'
Limhendeth has beseeched you to ignore whatever request Asmund made of you and to instead report his activities to Glordirith in Lórien.
By helping Asmund, you have not satisfied Limhendeth's request.
Talk to Glordirith at Imlad Lalaith

Glordirith is in south-eastern Lothlórien, at Imlad Lalaith in Egladil, on the banks of Anduin.\n\nLimhendeth has asked you to ignore whatever request Asmund made of you, and instead to report of his activities to Glordirith in Lothlórien.
